title: 'League of legends Accounts are now Riot Accounts' ghost pop up bug
body: Obviously this happened ages ago, but just today this has started popping up open logging in. As a pop up, it blocks the client behind it and the box to click on has no effect.

replies.body: Still stopping me from getting through, currently playing on a brand new acct lol
It went away for me just now, but was stopping me using either acc earlier
What do you mean?Is it hacked?I just experienced it and i clicked and entered the pages of confirmation with my password and e-mail confirmation?
